channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Google CSE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Google CSE

item.title: CVE-2024-4755|2024-08-01T20:47:41.777Z -- unknown -- google%20cse
item.description: The Google CSE WordPress plugin through 1.0.7 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)

item.title: CVE-2024-4755|2024-06-21T06:00:05.395Z -- unknown -- google%20cse
